name: RGBlues
description:
RGBlues is a casual game with clean graphics and bold environment, full of colors and groovy riffs that become more complex at each level. A real challenge that requires quick reflexes. Try to overcome your score using the least amount of moves and chances as possible to show that you got the rhythm!

This game was originally created for the Global Game Jam 2017, which theme was "Waves", and development continued after the jam.

GGJ entry: https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/rgblues
